notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Norsemen bought or sold real estate in Chicago last week:
J. W. Ries to Christian H. Jespersen: East Ravenswood Park, north of Ridgeway Avenue. Price, $4,000.
W. S. Safbom to Josephine L. Johnson: Winnemac Avenue, east of east Ravenswood Park. Price, $4,400.
K. Hagen to Thomas Hagen: Wabansia Avenue, west of Central Park Avenue. Price, $2,200.
F. Gehrman to William G. Olson: Carpenter Street, south of 78th Street. Price, $700.
W. Bruhus to Carl Lind: Peoria Street, north of 64th Street. Price, $8,000.
H. E. Clasen to J. C. Kirky: South 42nd Court, north of Colorado Avenue. Price, $2,000.
